title: Ticket #4768: Forward refreshed proxies for nordugrid jobs
description:
NorduGrid ARC allows the client to refresh the X.509 proxy for their jobs. It provides a command line tool called arcrenew to do so. We should take advantage of that ability in Condor for nordugrid grid universe jobs.

The arcrenew tool is probably using ARC's gridftp interface to do the proxy renewals. We should be able to perform the same set of ftp commands.
remarks:
2018-Mar-16 14:21:04 by jfrey:
To renew the proxy for a job, the ARC client connects to the gridftp server and issues the following commands: 
CWD /jobs
CWD <jobidnum>

I don't know if the Globus gridftp client will take a relative path for the CWD command, or if the server requires a relative path for the CWD command.

2018-Mar-26 16:35:12 by jfrey:
I have written code to support proxy renewal. But it requires testing.
